text: Wynne Pennell Bradburn was born 24 November, 1938 in Thames and died 25 September, 2008 in Hamilton. He is a former cricketer who played 2 tests for New Zealand in 1963/64. He twice carried the bat in first class matches. He is the father of New Zealand cricketer Grant Bradburn. ==Other websites== * Category:1938 births Category:2008 deaths Category:New Zealand cricketers
title: Wynne Bradburn
